duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and manage project administration, including document capture, billing, scheduling, and reporting.
Facilitate project billing and work within accounting practices.
Scheduling meetings, distributing surveys, and supporting project managers in reporting metrics.
Perform detailed and accurate data entry of customer communications into CRM system.
Provide professional communications to customers and contractors by phone or email regarding program offerings and customer/equipment eligibility.
Coordinate and effectively track the details of several project applications and operations team requests at the same time.
Maintain a strong understanding of program eligibility and participation requirements.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma/GED. Associates/BS/BA degree is preferred, but not required.
